text: How are standard libraries, tools and app server platforms typically selected in large organizations?
I'm looking for a list of criteria for selecting standard development libraries, tools, and application servers (specifically JEE) that is common across large organizations.
If your experience doesn't span across multiple large orgs, answering with how this is conducted within your current org is still helpful.
Also - 'standard' doesn't mean mandatory or exclusive, only that alternatives must be technically justified.
Are there standard development libraries, tools, and app server software within your organization at all?
If so how well are they adhered to?
Is there no standard or a decentralized way of doing business?
